name: CSS
practicals: Practical No:1 Write a JavaScript to implement different types of operators.
Practical No:2 Write a JavaScript to implement various conditional statements.
Practical No:3 Write a JavaScript to implement various looping statements.
Practical No:4 Write a JavaScript to implement concept of built-in functions and user defined functions.
Practical No:5 Write a JavaScript to implement Array.
Practical No:6 Write a JavaScript to implement Strings.
Practical No:7 Create a webpage using form elements.
Practical No:8 Create a webpage to implement different form events.
Practical No:9 Develop a webpage to perform operation on cookies.
Practical No:10 Develop a webpage using Intrinsic Java Functions.
Practical No:11 Develop a webpage for placing a window on the screen and working with child window.
Practical No:12 Develop a webpage for validation of form fields using regular expression.
Practical No:13 Create a webpage with Rollover Effects.
Practical No:14 Create a webpage to implement menus.
Practical No:15 Create a webpage to implement Status bars.
Practical No:16 Develop a webpage to implement webpage protection.
Practical No:17 Develop a webpage to implement slideshow and banner.

name: IFS
practicals: Practical No:1 Knowing the security provided with windows operating system
Practical No:2 Recovery the password of windows machines using password recover utility (John the ripper) or any other utility
Practical No:3 Tracing of email origin using eMailTracePro utility
Practical No:4 Use of keylogger and anti-key logger to secure your system
Practical No:5 Encrypt and decrypt the message using Simple Transposition â€“Permutation( Cryptool)
Practical No:6 Encrypt and decrypt the message using Caesar Cipher With Variable
Practical No:7 Encrypt and decrypt the message using 3 X 3 Hill Cipher( Cryptool)
Practical No:8 Create Digital Signature document (using Cryptool)
Practical No:9 Send and receive secret message using Steganography techniques using steghide
Practical No:10 Recover the data from formatted Pen drive and Hard Disk using power data Recovery utility or any other utility
